```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```


```{r data}
data("nyc_airbnb") 

nyc_airbnb_manhat = nyc_airbnb %>%
  mutate(rating = review_scores_location / 2) %>%
  select(neighbourhood_group, neighbourhood, price, rating, lat, long, room_type) %>%
  filter(
    neighbourhood_group == "Manhattan",
    price %in% 100:500
    ) %>%
  drop_na(rating)

nyc_airbnb = nyc_airbnb %>%
  mutate(rating = review_scores_location / 2) %>%
  select(neighbourhood_group, neighbourhood, price, rating, lat, long, room_type) %>%
  filter(
    price %in% 100:500,
    room_type == "Entire home/apt"
  ) %>%
  drop_na(rating)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Manhattan Airbnb Ratings 

```{r}
nyc_airbnb_manhat %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~lat, y = ~long, color = ~rating, alpha = 0.5, type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Manhattan Airbnb Rental Prices by Room Type 

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood_group = fct_reorder(neighbourhood_group, price)) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~price, color = ~neighbourhood_group, type = "box", colors = "viridis")
```

### Number of 5-Star AirBnbs for less than $150/Night by NYC Borough

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  filter(
    rating == "5",
    price < "150") %>%
  count(neighbourhood_group) %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood_group = fct_reorder(neighbourhood_group, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~neighbourhood_group, y = ~n, color = ~neighbourhood_group, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
